methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new AtLeastColumnConstraint with a default name, default group and a minimum value.

params.name: minValue
params.comment: the value for which all acceptable column values must be greater than or equal.

params.name: editorProvider
params.comment: an object that can provide a ConstraintEditor for this constraint type.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new AtLeastColumnConstraint with a minimum value, constraint name, and group

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the constraint.  For some types T, the default "At Least" may not be best.

params.name: minValue
params.comment: the value for which all acceptable column values must be greater than or equal.

params.name: editorProvider
params.comment: an object that can provide a ConstraintEditor for this constraint type.

params.name: group
params.comment: the name of the group used to organize the list of constraints for a column.

name: AtLeastColumnConstraint
comment:
Column Constraint where acceptable column values are greater than or equal to some specified
 value of the column type.
